title: Super Absorbent Dish Drying Mat Microfiber Fast-Drying Dish Mat 16" x 18" Kitchen Dish Drying Pad Pink Coral Marble
features: ◆SUPERIOR DRYING - This high performing dish drying mat absorbs excess water and keeps countertops dry better than any other dry mat.

◆MULTIPLE USAGE & HEAT RESISTANT - The high-quality durable silicone dish drying mat black works well as dry mat. It also doubles as a heat-resistant trivet for your table and countertop, perfect as a fridge liner, cupboard liner.
◆STAY DRY & CLEAN - Made with polyester mesh and extra thick foam to protect your delicate dishes and eliminates condensation and fog inside glassware.
◆EASY TO STORAGE - The lanyard design can hang everywhere without occupying space. It is soft and foldable, simply fold it up and toss in a drawer or tuck it elsewhere when not in use.

◆Customize gift: Unique advanced customize technology makes us print whatever you want into high quality products for memory as a best gift for your important people on Thanksgiving, Christmas, Halloween, and other festivals.
